main.title: Seed Properties for Bootstrap
main.description: Quickly add properties from public listings to give renters something to browse and review. These will be marked as "Community-Submitted" until landlords claim them.

guidelines.title: Community Property Guidelines
guidelines.rule1: Only add properties from legitimate public listings
guidelines.rule3: Properties will be marked as claimable by verified landlords
guidelines.rule4: All community properties include legal disclaimers

validation.fieldsRequired: Please fill in all required fields (address, city, state, zip code, and source)
validation.success: Community property added successfully! Property can now be claimed by verified landlords.
validation.error: Error: {{message}}. Ensure you have admin/landlord permissions.
validation.tokenPrompt: Enter admin token (your landlord account token):
validation.loaded: Property seeder loaded. Ready to bootstrap your platform!
